title.guidance: Violent & sexual content. Scenes viewers may find upsetting.
title.synopsis: While staying with a recently widowed friend, Miss Marple meets charming young drifter Mike Rogers. Then events take a sinister turn when a dangerous killer strikes.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Join Marple and a host of famous faces in this classic whodunnit

synopses.ninety: Join Marple and a host of famous faces in this classic whodunnit

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, moderate language and scenes that some viewers may find distressing
episodes.synopsis: Miss Marple is called by an old friend to help discover who strangled a young dancer in the library of Gossington Hall.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Miss Marple is called by an old friend to help discover who strangled a young dancer in the library of Gossington Hall.

episodes.synopsis: Colonel Protheroe is intensely disliked, but when he is found slumped over the desk in a vicarage study, Miss Marple must unpick the truth.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Colonel Protheroe is intensely disliked, but when he is found slumped over the desk in a vicarage study, Miss Marple must unpick the truth.

episodes.synopsis: When Elspeth McGillicuddy sees a woman on a train being strangled, the authorities think that she has been dreaming, but Miss Marple knows better...

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Elspeth McGillicuddy sees a woman on a train being strangled, the authorities think that she has been dreaming, but Miss Marple knows better...

episodes.synopsis: Zoë Wanamaker guest stars when Miss Marple sets about uncovering a village's dark secrets, following the announcement of a murder in the personal columns of a local paper.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Zoë Wanamaker guest stars when Miss Marple sets about uncovering a village's dark secrets, following the announcement of a murder in the personal columns of a local paper.

episodes.guidance: Violence and the aftermath of violence.
episodes.synopsis: When Gwenda Halliday moves in to the home of her dreams, she begins to see ghostly apparitions which leads Miss Marple to an unsolved murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Gwenda Halliday moves in to the home of her dreams, she begins to see ghostly apparitions which leads Miss Marple to an unsolved murder.

episodes.synopsis: In the town of Lymstock an outbreak of anonymous hate mail results in a woman's suicide. As the letters become even more deadly, the village is thrown into turmoil.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In the town of Lymstock an outbreak of anonymous hate mail results in a woman's suicide. As the letters become even more deadly, the village is thrown into turmoil.

episodes.episodeTitle: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
episodes.synopsis: Tommy and Tuppence enlist Miss Marple's help when their elderly aunt dies suddenly and a friend of the dead woman goes missing.

description.descriptionTextStrong: 3. By the Pricking of My Thumbs
description.descriptionTextNormal: Tommy and Tuppence enlist Miss Marple's help when their elderly aunt dies suddenly and a friend of the dead woman goes missing.

episodes.numberedEpisodeTitle: 3. By the Pricking of My Thumbs

episodes.synopsis: Miss Marple visits a house in Devon - when an Ouija board accurately predicts the demise of the house's owner, she must work out the cause of death.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Miss Marple visits a house in Devon - when an Ouija board accurately predicts the demise of the house's owner, she must work out the cause of death.

episodes.guidance: Contains use of racially discriminatory language and some mild crime scene images.
episodes.synopsis: Miss Marple arrives at Bertram's Hotel to find that there are secrets lurking there. When a maid is murdered, things take an even more sinister turn.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Miss Marple arrives at Bertram's Hotel to find that there are secrets lurking there. When a maid is murdered, things take an even more sinister turn.

episodes.synopsis: Miss Marple is invited to a wedding, and finds a house full of secrets as well as a family coming to terms with the wrongful hanging of their brother.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Miss Marple is invited to a wedding, and finds a house full of secrets as well as a family coming to terms with the wrongful hanging of their brother.

episodes.guidance: Contains occasional use of moderate language and crime scene gore.
episodes.synopsis: When her holiday at a friend's coastal villa is interrupted by the mysterious death of one of her fellow guests, hours after he had told a ghostly tale, Miss Marple investigates.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When her holiday at a friend's coastal villa is interrupted by the mysterious death of one of her fellow guests, hours after he had told a ghostly tale, Miss Marple investigates.

episodes.guidance: Contains peril and some mild swearing.
episodes.synopsis: After receiving instructions from a recently deceased friend, Miss Marple finds herself on a mystery coach tour with her nephew Raymond West and some intriguing passengers.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After receiving instructions from a recently deceased friend, Miss Marple finds herself on a mystery coach tour with her nephew Raymond West and some intriguing passengers.

episodes.guidance: Contains sexual scenes and some use of moderate language
episodes.synopsis: When a business magnate is killed, Miss Marple realises the circumstances of his death recall a nursery rhyme - but what does it mean?

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a business magnate is killed, Miss Marple realises the circumstances of his death recall a nursery rhyme - but what does it mean?

episodes.guidance: Contains some moderate crime scene images.
episodes.synopsis: Benedict Cumberbatch guest stars as detective Luke Fitzwilliam and joins Miss Marple to investigate unexpected deaths in the village of Wychwood-under-Ashe.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Benedict Cumberbatch guest stars as detective Luke Fitzwilliam and joins Miss Marple to investigate unexpected deaths in the village of Wychwood-under-Ashe.

episodes.guidance: Contains bloody crime scenes, violence and some moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: Joan Collins plays Miss Marple's crime-busting chum Ruth Van Rydock to help dig deeper into a murder that takes place during a rehearsal of an amateur stage show.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Joan Collins plays Miss Marple's crime-busting chum Ruth Van Rydock to help dig deeper into a murder that takes place during a rehearsal of an amateur stage show.

episodes.guidance: Contains the aftermath of violent crimes, moderate language and scenes some viewers may find upsetting.
episodes.synopsis: Rafe Spall plays a distracting piano teacher as supersleuth Miss Marple digs into the devastating truth behind a series of murders - and a dying man's enigmatic last words.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Rafe Spall plays a distracting piano teacher as supersleuth Miss Marple digs into the devastating truth behind a series of murders - and a dying man's enigmatic last words.

episodes.guidance: Contains pagan and occult rituals, crime scenes and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: After a friend is murdered, Miss Marple vows to seek justice. A clue leads her to an inn run by modern-day witches who claim to be able to kill by black magic.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After a friend is murdered, Miss Marple vows to seek justice. A clue leads her to an inn run by modern-day witches who claim to be able to kill by black magic.

episodes.synopsis: Ruth Jones plays an intriguing guest of the host of a country estate. When someone is killed at the stately home, Miss Marple discovers a coded message and a dark secret.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Ruth Jones plays an intriguing guest of the host of a country estate. When someone is killed at the stately home, Miss Marple discovers a coded message and a dark secret.

episodes.synopsis: Did a woman really die of shock when the geranium in her wallpaper turned blue? Can Marple stop a trial before the wrong person is found guilty of murder?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Did a woman really die of shock when the geranium in her wallpaper turned blue? Can Marple stop a trial before the wrong person is found guilty of murder?

episodes.episodeTitle: The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side
episodes.synopsis: Joanna Lumley is Miss Marple's friend Dolly Bantry, who attends a fateful Hollywood party. When a fan dies after drinking a poisoned cocktail, our sleuth wonders if was planned.

description.descriptionTextStrong: 4. The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side
description.descriptionTextNormal: Joanna Lumley is Miss Marple's friend Dolly Bantry, who attends a fateful Hollywood party. When a fan dies after drinking a poisoned cocktail, our sleuth wonders if was planned.

episodes.numberedEpisodeTitle: 4. The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side

episodes.synopsis: While holidaying on a Caribbean island, Miss Marple is drawn into a web of deceit and death, and with the help of a tycoon, sets to work unravelling the truth.

description.descriptionTextNormal: While holidaying on a Caribbean island, Miss Marple is drawn into a web of deceit and death, and with the help of a tycoon, sets to work unravelling the truth.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence, crime scene gore and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: Miss Marple helps a friend seek refuge at Greenshaw's Folly. But a shadow soon begins to fall over the various inhabitants living there.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Miss Marple helps a friend seek refuge at Greenshaw's Folly. But a shadow soon begins to fall over the various inhabitants living there.
